Constructor.description: Add a constructor to your component

Bind Method.description: Bind a method to 'this' in your constructor

Set State.description: Update the state of your component

componentDidMount.description: componentDidMount() is invoked immediately after a component is mounted (inserted into the tree)

componentDidUpdate.description: componentDidUpdate() is invoked immediately after updating occurs. This method is not called for the initial render

componentWillUnmount.description: componentWillUnmount() is invoked immediately before a component is unmounted and destroyed

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Use shouldComponentUpdate() to let React know if a componentâ€™s output is not affected by the current change in state or props

getDerivedStateFromProps.description: getDerivedStateFromProps is invoked right before calling the render method, both on the initial mount and on subsequent updates

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate.description: getSnapshotBeforeUpdate() is invoked right before the most recently rendered output is committed to e.g. the DOM

componentDidCatch.description: Error boundaries are React components that catch JavaScript errors anywhere in their child component tree, log those errors, and display a fallback UI instead of the component tree that crashed

Stateless Functional Component With Styl.description: A staleless functional component with MUI styles

Functional Component With Styles.description: A functional component with MUI styles
